titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to permit advanced refunding of private activity bonds with governmental bonds under certain limited circumstances.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 3/6/2001--Introduced. Amends the Internal Revenue Code to permit the exemption from Federal income tax of interest on a bond if, as of the date of the bond being refunded, the bond would not be classified as a private activity bond.
